alert.note: Alert for Laramie (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 1:16PM MDT until August 07 at 1:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Laramie County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 145 PM MDT. * At 115 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Horse Creek to near Crystal Lake Campground to 6 miles southeast of Buford, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Federal around 135 PM MDT. Whitaker around 140 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 1 and 5, and between mile markers 20 and 37. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 341 and 358. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
